amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 77, 78, 79, 80, 83, 84, 85, 87, 88, 89, 90, 91, 98, 107, 108, 109, 111, 116, and 135 printed in part A of House Report 113-460. See page D544 of the Congressional Record for May 21, 2014, for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 5 consisting of amendments numbered 77, 78, 79, 80, 83, 84, 85, 87, 88, 89, 90, 91, 98, 107, 108, 109, 111, 116, and 135 printed in Part A of House Report 113-460.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A023) offered by Mr. McKeon.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A023) offered by Mr. McKeon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
